source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: Management by Objectives
items.headline: Management by Objectives is the process of setting objectives in an organization to give direction to the employees.
objectives_summary: Explain What is meant by Management by Objectives
Describe Who advocated the concept of MBO
Explain the Need for MBO

items.title: Management 101: Employee Goal Setting & Results Tracking
items.headline: Be a better manager! Help your employees reach their goals and become rockstars for your company  in 2021
objectives_summary: Learn From A Top Rated Instructor Who Has Been Teaching On Udemy Since 2013 and Taught Over 100,000 Students!
Template Download: The Excel Template Is Available For Download At The Course End
The SMARTER Method

items.title: Business Process Management (BPM) Practice exams

visible_instructors.job_title: Business Consulting, Solution Architecture, Integration of c
visible_instructors.title: Brandi Chastain
visible_instructors.name: Brandi

items.headline: Pass the GAQ BPM certification on the first attempt. 70 questions
objectives_summary: Business process management (BPM)® is a systematic approach to making an organization's workflow more effective, more efficient and more capable of adapting to an ever-changing environment. A business process is an activity or set of activities that will accomplish a specific organizational goal.

items.title: Asana Masterclass: Exacts Templates to Manage Your Business
items.headline: My Exact Template that I PERSONALLY Created In Asana To Manage All Of Our Clients and Projects That Our Team Uses Daily.
objectives_summary: I Want to Give You My Exact Template that I PERSONALLY Created In Asana To Manage All Of Our Clients and Projects That Our Team Uses Daily. This Template Will Help You Organize Your Projects, Stay On Track With Timelines and Better Manage Your Team!

items.title: The Complete A/B Testing Course for Beginners
items.headline: A/B Testing, Working, Use, Test, Process, Data Collection, Goals, Creating Variations, Run Experiment, Tools & more
objectives_summary: Students will be able to Learn A/B Testing
Students will be able to Learn Working of A/B Testing
Students will be able to Learn Use of A/B testing

items.title: Ideas To Results: How To Be A Project Manager
items.headline: Successful PM takes planning, leadership and collaboration. Learn to lead your projects and business to great results!
objectives_summary: Understand the demands of modern business environment and how project management strategy affects organisations
Get a handle on project management fundamentals- stages, control, critical paths and closure.
Master project planning for effective use of the human resources and physical resources.

items.title: How To Write A Business Plan To Attract Finance
items.headline: Learn how to write a business plan to successfully raise finance using the tools funders use to appraise your business
objectives_summary: Learn the techniques used by funders to appraise business plans for decision making
Learn how to ensure the important issues of lenders and investors are addressed in a business plan
Learn the different types of funding strategies available and how to access funding

items.title: (6 Mock Up Tests 1200 Q) PMP Test - PMBok 7th 2021

Basics to pass PMP® exam
This Practical Questions & Exams course created based on “A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge – 7th Edition”
